name: Fables of the Kingdom III: Collector's Edition
storyline: An urgent messaging from our friends in the elven lands tells of a terrible crystalline force that ascends from deep within the earth to drain power from the Tree of Life. Worse still, an old adversary, Balen is behind it. The Heart of the Elements is the only artifact powerful enough to stop Balen and retrieving it will require a dangerous journey to Fire Mountain.
